resources.string: In order to use this application we will first need to request location permission from you. Otherwise we will not be able to provide you with our service. If you agree and wish to continue tap on the button below.
Long press on the map \n to add a geofence

We are a group of enthusiasts working relentlessly day in day out for utilising technology for a better cause. We aim to solve real-world problems and build products that can impact others. We are putting immense efforts into increasing our standards and hope to fulfill our dreams encouraging many others to dive deep into technology and bring the best out of it making the world a better place.
Go to Map, click on the add button and then click on the first icon.
Select the radius of the unsafe zone.
Long hold the location where you wish to add unsafe zone.
